name: Alex!
greetingText: It's 19th of April... what a special date, isn't it?
wishText: Keep shining and flying high like you already do, even the sky is not the limit for you!
text1: ¡¡ES TU CUMPLEAÑOS!! (It's your birthday in Spanish :P)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you beautiful Alex!! I wish you the best...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then I thought... that maybe...
outroText: Enjoy every single moment and experience of this year that's starting NOW, huge things are waiting for you!
replayText: It's going to be amazing! As you are... <3 ... Click again if you want to rewatch it hehe
